snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include how Sergey Brin's and Larry Page's relationships to Google have changed over the years, New York again coming...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include how Sergey Brin's and Larry Page's relationships to Google have changed over the years, New York again coming in a solid second to Silicon Valley in deal value and why Google Flu Trends may need some adjustments.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Touch Technology and Flu Googling
